message.content:
{"id": "124066", 
"title": "Bug 124066: 'Insert Chart' in context menu is not translated into Chinese", 
"description": "Bug 124066: In the context menu, the option 'Insert Chart' is not translated into Chinese.", 
"OB": "The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu is not translated into Chinese.", 
"EB": "The 'Insert Chart' option in the context menu should be translated into Chinese.", 
"SR": "Steps to reproduce: 1. Create a report in a Chinese environment."}

origin.input_prompt:
Your role is a senior software engineer, you are very good at analyzing and writing bug reports.
It is possible that the bug report may lack sufficient details in the OB, EB, and SR sections.  In such cases, your task is to infer the appropriate details based on the context and supplement the bug report to ensure it contains clear and complete OB/EB/SR statements.  Also, improve the wording of these statements for clarity where possible.
To facilitate this process, please provide your responses in JSON format as follows:
{"id": "", "title": "", "description": "", "OB": "", "EB": "", "SR": ""}
origin.input_content:
<BUG REPORT>
{'id': '124066', 'title': 'Bug 124066in context menu, insert chart is not translated into chinese', 'description': 'Bug 124066in context menu, insert chart is not translated into chinese ', 'OB': '', 'EB': '', 'SR': 'steps to reproduce: create a report (chinese env.) '}
